content.description: For 0 ≤ t ≤ 31 , the rate of change of the number of mosquitoes on Tropical Island at time t days is modeled by <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>R</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><msqrt> <mi>t</mi> </msqrt> <mtext> </mtext><mi>cos</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo> <mrow> <mfrac> <mi>t</mi> <mn>5</mn> </mfrac> </mrow> <mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaWGsbWaaeWaa8aabaWdbiaadshaaiaawIcacaGLPaaacqGH9aqp caaI1aWaaOaaa8aabaWdbiaadshaaSqabaGcpaGaaGjbV=qaciGGJb Gaai4BaiaacohadaqadaWdaeaapeWaaSaaa8aabaWdbiaadshaa8aa baWdbiaaiwdaaaaacaGLOaGaayzkaaaaaa@44BD@ </annotation> </semantics> </math> mosquitoes per day. There are 1000 mosquitoes on Tropical Island at time t=0.
content.question: According to the model, how many mosquitoes will be on the island at time t=31? Round your answer to the nearest whole number.

frqParts.text: According to the model, how many mosquitoes will be on the island at time t=31? Round your answer to the nearest whole number.
